Référence de la classe Html2Text Html2Text Graphe de collaboration de Html2Text: Fonctions membres publiques __construct ($html='', $options=array()) getHtml () setHtml ($html) set_html ($html, $from_file=false) getText () get_text () print_text () p () setBaseUrl ($baseurl) set_base_url ($baseurl) Champs de données const ENCODING = 'UTF-8' Fonctions membres protégées convert () doConvert () converter (&$text) buildlinkList ($link, $display, $linkOverride=null) convertPre (&$text) convertBlockquotes (&$text) pregCallback ($matches) pregPreCallback ( $matches) toupper ($str) strtoupper ($str) tostrike ($str) Attributs protégés $htmlFuncFlags $html $text $search $replace $entSearch $entReplace $callbackSearch $preSearch $preReplace $preContent = '' $baseurl = '' $converted = false $linkList = array() $options Documentation des constructeurs et destructeur __construct() __constructHtml2Text Html2Text__construct __construct ( $html = '' , $options = array() ) Paramètres string$html Source HTML array$options Set configuration options Documentation des fonctions membres buildlinkList() buildlinkListHtml2Text Html2TextbuildlinkList buildlinkList ( $link, $display, $linkOverride = null )[protected] Helper function called by preg_replace() on link replacement. Maintains an internal list of links to be displayed at the end of the text, with numeric indices to the original point in the text they appeared. Also makes an effort at identifying and handling absolute and relative links. Paramètres string$link URL of the link string$display Part of the text to associate number with null$linkOverride Renvoie string convert() convertHtml2Text Html2Textconvert convert ( )[protected] convertBlockquotes() convertBlockquotesHtml2Text Html2TextconvertBlockquotes convertBlockquotes (& $text)[protected] Helper function for BLOCKQUOTE body conversion. Paramètres string$str Text to convert Renvoie string Converted text Documentation des champs $baseurl $baseurlHtml2Text Html2Text$baseurl string $baseurl = ''[protected] Contains the base URL that relative links should resolve to. $callbackSearch $callbackSearchHtml2Text Html2Text$callbackSearch array $callbackSearch[protected]Valeur initiale := array( '/<(h)[123456]( [^>]*)?>(.*?)<\/h[123456]>/i', '/[ ]*<(p)( [^>]*)?>(.*?)<\/p>[ ]*/si', '/<(br)[^>]*>[ ]*/i', '/<(b)( [^>]*)?>(.*?)<\/b>/i', '/<(strong)( [^>]*)?>(.*?)<\/strong>/i', '/<(del)( [^>]*)?>(.*?)<\/del>/i', '/<(th)( [^>]*)?>(.*?)<\/th>/i', '/<(a) [^>]*href=("|\')([^"\']+)\2([^>]*)>(.*?)<\/a>/i' ) List of preg* regular expression patterns to search for and replace using callback function. $converted $convertedHtml2Text Html2Text$converted boolean $converted = false[protected] Indicates whether content in the $html variable has been converted yet. ', '    ', ' ', '', '', ) List of pattern replacements corresponding to patterns searched for PRE body. Voir également $preReplace $replace $replaceHtml2Text Html2Text$replace array $replace[protected]Valeur initiale := array( '', ' ', '', '', '', '_\\1_', '_\\1_', '_\\1_', "\n\n", "\n\n", "\n\n", "\t* \\1\n", " \\1\n", "\t* \\1", "\n\t* ", "\n-------------------------\n", "
\n", "\n\n", "\n", "\t\t\\1\n", "", '[\\2]', ) List of pattern replacements corresponding to patterns searched. Voir également $search $search $searchHtml2Text Html2Text$search array $search[protected]Valeur initiale := array( "/\r/", "/[\n\t]+/", '/]*>.*?<\/head>/i', '/]*>.*?<\/script>/i', '/]*>.*?<\/style>/i', '/]*>(.*?)<\/i>/i', '/]*>(.*?)<\/em>/i', '/]*>(.*?)<\/ins>/i', '/(]*>|<\/ul>)/i', '/(]*>|<\/ol>)/i', '/(]*>|<\/dl>)/i', '/]*>(.*?)<\/li>/i', '/]*>(.*?)<\/dd>/i', '/]*>(.*?)<\/dt>/i', '/]*>/i', '/]*>/i', '/]*>/i', '/(]*>|<\/table>)/i', '/(]*>|<\/tr>)/i', '/]*>(.*?)<\/td>/i', '/.+?<\/span>/i', '/<(img)\b[^>]*alt=\"([^>"]+)\"[^>]*>/i', ) List of preg* regular expression patterns to search for, used in conjunction with $replace. Voir également $replace $text $textHtml2Text Html2Text$text string $text[protected] Contains the converted, formatted text. ENCODING ENCODINGHtml2Text Html2TextENCODING const ENCODING = 'UTF-8' La documentation de cette classe a été générée à partir du fichier suivant : public/glpi/vendor/html2text/html2text/src/Html2Text.php
